articles.title: Benz Hui seen waiting tables at daughter's cafe at Orchard Road - AsiaOne
articles.description: Benz Hui may be a well-loved veteran actor but that doesn't mean menial tasks are beneath him. The 73-year-old was spotted waiting tables at his daughter Charmaine's cha chaan teng (Hong Kong-style cafe) Juju in Wheelock Place. Hong Kong YouTuber Ms Karman po…
articles.content:
Benz Hui may be a well-loved veteran actor but that doesn't mean menial tasks are beneath him.

articles.title: South Korean actress Gong Hyo-jin and singer Kevin Oh confirm relationship - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The pair was spotted together at the wedding of fellow celebrities, Son Ye-jin and Hyun Bin, where Gong was said to have caught the bridal bouquet.
articles.content:
Singer Oh, who is 31, also confirmed the news through a letter on his official fan forum.
